sentences.sContent: Have you met my husband Roy?
sentences.sCn: 你见过我的丈夫罗伊吗？

sentences.sContent: ...My husband is planning a surprise holiday for the two of us next week...
...so she does not have to ask her husband for money whenever she wants to buy something...
...What does Barbara's husband suggest she do if she wants to work...
...She's been offered an excellent job with the government her husband feels it's unnecessary for her to work since the family does not need the added income...
...described a family in which the husband initially reacted to losing his job “with tireless search for work...
...Social workers discover that the wife normally tries to take care of her husband herself for as long as she can in order not to use up their life savings...
...Her husband feels it's unnecessary for her to work since the family does not need the added income...
...What does Barbara's husband suggest she do if she wants to work...

words.tran: 丈夫的；节俭的；善于管理农活的

trans.tranOther: the man that a woman is married to
